title: HYPNOTIC ECSTASY/ INDUCTION WITH FASCINATION, MESMERIC PASSES, SOUNDS & ASMR
description:
Dr. Marco Paret used asmr sounds, breathing and magnetic passes on one of his students. She entered in a deep hypnotic state of ecstasy. While being in a hypnotic ecstasy, the subjects entered like in another dimension and connect to the universe and their deepest selves. These images are from Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass Magnetic Path. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
